com.amazon.device.iap.model

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.device.iap.model.Product
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public final class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Represents an in-app product, such as consumable content, entitlement content, or subscription content. Retrieve product data by using PurchasingService.getProductData(java.util.Set) .

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

      • getSku

        public java.lang.String getSku()
        Returns the stock-keeping unit (SKU) of the product. A SKU is a unique identifier for a purchasable product. A SKU is unique to each developer account with the Amazon Appstore. It is a case-sensitive string containing only alphanumerics, underscores, periods, and dashes. It must be 150 characters or less.
        Returns:
        The product SKU.

      • getProductType

        public ProductType getProductType()
        Returns the type of product.
        Returns:
        The product type.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns the localized description of the product. If no description for the locale, returns the default (English).
        Returns:
        The localized product description.

      • getPrice

        public java.lang.String getPrice()
        Returns the price of the product. The price includes the currency symbol and the numerical value, In the case of a subscription parent product, this is null.
        Returns:
        The price of the product.

      • getSmallIconUrl

        public java.lang.String getSmallIconUrl()
        Returns the url of the small icon.
        Returns:
        The small icon URL for the product.

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns the localized title of the product. If no title for the locale, returns the default (English).
        Returns:
        The localized product title.

      • getCoinsReward

        public CoinsReward getCoinsReward()
        May be null. Provides a CoinsReward which, if not null, contains data about the Amazon Coins reward that a customer may receive by purchasing this product.
        Returns:
        CoinsReward
